trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract definition of data passed by an XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.
A <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Message> can contain either document-oriented or procedure-oriented information.
Procedure-oriented messages contain parameters and return values, while document-oriented messages contain documents.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Message> class corresponds to a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `message` element enclosed by the `definitions` root element.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref>.

Searches the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePartCollection"></xref> returned by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message.Parts"></xref> property, and returns the named <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref>.
A string that names the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> to be returned.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref>.
No <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> with the specified name exists within the collection.

Searches the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePartCollection"></xref> returned by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message.Parts"></xref> property and returns an array of type <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> that contains the named instances.
An array of names of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> instances to be returned.
An array of type <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref>.
No <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> instances with the specified names exist within the collection.
Gets the collection of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePartCollection"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> of which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref> is a member.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
